name: annabachao-frontend
description: AnnaBachao Food Waste Management Mobile App

scripts.test:auth: node -e "const TestSuite = require('./tests/testsprite.test.js'); const suite = new TestSuite(); suite.testAuthenticationFlow().then(console.log);"
scripts.test:donation: node -e "const TestSuite = require('./tests/testsprite.test.js'); const suite = new TestSuite(); suite.testDonationFlow().then(console.log);"
scripts.test:ngo: node -e "const TestSuite = require('./tests/testsprite.test.js'); const suite = new TestSuite(); suite.testNGODashboard().then(console.log);"
scripts.test:admin: node -e "const TestSuite = require('./tests/testsprite.test.js'); const suite = new TestSuite(); suite.testAdminPanel().then(console.log);"
scripts.test:all: node -e "const TestSuite = require('./tests/testsprite.test.js'); const suite = new TestSuite(); suite.runAllTests().then(console.log);"
scripts.test:complete: npm run test:mcp && npm run test:enhanced && npm run test:fullstack
